links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,2,0,0,0,0,-1).
prog: (Sage) [lcm(n,5)/5for n in xrange(1, 51)] # [_Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 07 2009](PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b060791.txt", n, " ", n / gcd(n, 5)); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 12 2009(PARI) for (n=1,1000,print1(n/(5-4*(n%5>0))", ")) \\ _Zak Seidov_, Feb 17 2011
author: _Len Smiley_, Apr 26 2001
extensions: Extended using terms from b-file, _Michel Marcus_, Feb 08 2014
